wikipedia_page.main: Guto Dafydd (born c.1990) is a Welsh poet and novelist, who writes in the Welsh language. He has twice won the Crown at the National Eisteddfod of Wales and is twice winner of the Daniel Owen Prize for a novel.

response: *National Eisteddfod of Wales: Crown – Guto Dafydd
*Gwobr Goffa Daniel Owen: Guto Dafydd, Ymbelydredd
*Gwobr Goffa Daniel Owen: Guto Dafydd, Carafanio
